mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT S.SCS_NAME, S.SCS_PIC, R.ROAD_ADDR, R.DETAIL_ADDR, REGEXP_REPLACE(M.PHONE, '(02|.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') as PHONE, COUNT(S.SCS_NAME) as PAYCOUNT FROM SCS S, SCS_PAY P, RES R, MEMBER M WHERE S.SCS_NAME = P.SCS_NAME AND S.RES_NAME = R.RES_NAME AND M.EMAIL = R.EMAIL GROUP BY S.SCS_NAME, S.SCS_PIC, R.ROAD_ADDR, R.DETAIL_ADDR, M.PHONE order by PAYCOUNT desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT H.HP_NAME, H.HP_PIC, R.ROAD_ADDR, R.DETAIL_ADDR, REGEXP_REPLACE(M.PHONE, '(02|.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') as PHONE, COUNT(H.HP_NAME) as PAYCOUNT FROM HP H, HP_PAY P, RES R, MEMBER M WHERE H.HP_NAME = P.HP_NAME AND H.RES_NAME = R.RES_NAME AND M.EMAIL = R.EMAIL GROUP BY H.HP_NAME, H.HP_PIC, R.ROAD_ADDR, R.DETAIL_ADDR, M.PHONE order by PAYCOUNT desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
